body_html: I think "periodic_intersperse" is a very confusing name. This feel more like a (nearest neighbor) resampling or slicing operation. Is there an equivalent numpy method from which we can get inspiration for a better name?
body_text: I think "periodic_intersperse" is a very confusing name. This feel more like a (nearest neighbor) resampling or slicing operation. Is there an equivalent numpy method from which we can get inspiration for a better name?
